ios.dev.debug.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Dev (Debug)" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.dev.release.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Dev (Release)" -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.stage.debug.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Stage (Debug)" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.stage.release.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Stage (Release)" -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.prod.debug.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Prod (Debug)" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.prod.release.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Prod (Release)" -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

android.dev.debug.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleDevDebug assembleDevDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.dev.release.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleDevRelease assembleDevReleaseAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..

android.stage.debug.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleStageDebug assembleStageDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.stage.release.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleStageRelease assembleStageReleaseAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..

android.prod.debug.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleProdDebug assembleProdDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.prod.release.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleProdRelease assembleProdReleaseAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..
